#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
     int t;
     cin >> t;
     while(t--)
     {
       int m,n,s,p,q;
       int v_p=0,r_p=0,count=0;
       cin >>n>>m;
       cin >>s;
       cin >> p >> q;
       for(int i=1;i<=s;i++)
        {
          
              v_p+=p;
              if(v_p > n)
               {
                   v_p=(v_p-n)%(n-m+1)+m-1;
                   
               }
              
               r_p+=q;
              if(r_p > n)
               {
                  r_p=(r_p-n)%(n-m+1)+m-1;
               }
         
          if(r_p==v_p)
           count++;
        }
        cout << count <<endl;
     }
     
	return 0;
}
